description: This file contains the implementation of back-end API functions for the COSA Data Model related to Device Information, including parameter retrieval and setting functions, specifically for firmware download control and status. It also manages external references, internal functions, and various parameters related to firmware updates.

methods.name: BOOL DeviceInfo_GetParamBoolValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,BOOL * pBool)
methods.description: Retrieves boolean parameters like firmware download flag and cable RF signal status, with platform-specific handling.

methods.name: ULONG DeviceInfo_GetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,char * pValue,ULONG * pUlSize)
methods.description: Retrieves string parameters such as firmware download status, protocol, URL, and image, possibly calling internal data layer functions.

methods.name: BOOL DeviceInfo_SetParamBoolValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,BOOL bValue)
methods.description: Sets boolean parameters, notably initiating firmware download process if requested.

methods.name: BOOL DeviceInfo_SetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,char * pString)
methods.description: Sets string parameters related to firmware download URL and image, propagating changes via internal APIs.
